thread.title: Singh Is Bliing is the perfect comeback for Lara Dutta Bhupathi
thread.title_full: Singh Is Bliing is the perfect comeback for Lara Dutta Bhupathi

author: Maggie Davis
title: Singh Is Bliing is the perfect comeback for Lara Dutta Bhupathi
text:
Singh Is Bliing is the perfect comeback for Lara Dutta Bhupathi By Maggie Davis on October 5, 2015 at 8:58 PM Comments 
The gorgeous Indian actress Lara Dutta Bhupathi has made a comeback in the industry with Prabhu Deva directorial ‘Singh Is Bliing’ . In this film, the movie fanatics saw the other side of Lara. The audience were eagerly waiting to see the new on-screen pair – Akshay Kumar and Amy Jackson but Lara turned out to be a surprise package. We have seen numerous avatar of Lara but her role in ‘Singh Is Bliing’ was phenomenal. She was the real entertainer. 
In the film, Lara played the role of Emily who is a translator hired by Raftaar Singh (Akshay Kumar). As Raftaar did not know English and Sara (Amy Jackson) did not know Hindi, Lara made her entry in the film as their translator. Well, the beauty didn’t just play like a cartoonist translator but the dialogues scripted for her were superb. To see Lara in a comedy role was a surprise. We have seen her in a sexy avatar but this was a new experience. (ALSO READ: Singh Is Bliing box office report: Akshay Kumar starrer receives fantastic response on day one) 
Emily (Lara Dutta) had some amazing replies for Raftaar’s antics in the film. Sara who was a sexy action queen was called as ‘Sara the Dhara’ by Emily. Even if some funny dances moves were needed, Lara did the perfect job like in the song Dil Kare Chu Che . Emily created a perfect mayhem for Raftaar and Sara. Lara in ‘Singh Is Bliing’ is absolutely loved by movie fanatics! (ALSO READ: Singh Is Bliing movie review: Akshay Kumar and Lara Dutta are the real entertainers)
